long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the Full Potential of ChatGPT with Prompti!
Constructed with OpenAI's most advanced language model in mind, Prompti is a Chrome extension designed to seamlessly integrate with ChatGPT. Its main purpose is to enhance the quality of your interactions, providing guidance to craft efficient and impactful prompts.

Why Prompti?
ChatGPT is an incredible tool with vast potential, but getting the best out of it often depends on how well you phrase your prompts. Prompti offers an innovative solution to this challenge by offering tailored assistance to the user in constructing effective prompts, leading to more refined responses from ChatGPT.

Key Features:
Prompt Templates: Access an extensive collection of over 110+ pre-constructed prompt templates, primed for a diverse set of tasks.

Tailored Inputs: Based on your chosen topic, Prompti provides tailored input suggestions that help craft more precise and effective prompts.

Backend Prompting: Prompti takes prompt optimization a step farther by providing additional prompting based on the chosen topic, ensuring you secure the precise results you seek.

Compatibility: Effortless integration with ChatGPT plugins with custom-made prompts designed to help you utilize the new features to their full potential

User-Friendly Interface: Navigate with ease through our intuitive and user-friendly interface, suitable for both seasoned users and beginners.

Unlock the Power of Precise Prompts
Donâ€™t let the complexity of prompt construction limit your interactions with ChatGPT. Let Prompti be your companion, guiding you to optimize your use of ChatGPT, and helping you generate more valuable, detailed, and relevant responses.

Get started Today!
Download Prompti - your personal ChatGPT companion, and make your interactions with ChatGPT more fruitful, engaging, and enjoyable.
